name: Project Report-BUHR-I
query:
SELECT 
`tabProject`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:300",
`tabProject`.`name` as "Project:Link/Project:300",
`tabProject`.`territory` as "Territory::80",
`tabProject`.`status` as "Status::120",
`tabProject`.`mode_of_interview` as "MoI::120",
`tabProject`.`project_status` as "Project Status::80",
`tabProject`.`project_type` as "Project Type::80",
`tabProject`.`expected_start_date` as "Project Date:Date:80",
DATEDIFF( curdate(),`tabProject`.expected_start_date) as "Age::80",
count(*) AS "Positions::80",
sum(`tabTask`.`r1_count`) AS "Vacancies::80",
sum(`tabTask`.`pending_profiles_to_send`) AS "PPS::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM 
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Sourced',"Submitted")
AND
`tabCandidate`.project = `tabProject`.name
) AS "PPCR::80",
`tabProject`.`closure` as "#CL::90",
`tabProject`.`cpc` as "Client Relation Executive::200",
`tabDirect Interview Details`.`date` as "EDoI:Date:90",
`tabProject`.`remark` as "Remarks::300"
FROM 
`tabProject`
Left Join `tabTask` ON `tabProject`.name =`tabTask`.project
Left Join `tabDirect Interview Details` ON `tabProject`.name =`tabDirect Interview Details`.parent
WHERE
`tabProject`.territory in ('Kuwait','Oman','Qatar','Singapore','Algeria','Ghana','South Africa','Nigeria','Maldives')
AND
`tabProject`.status not in ('Completed','Cancelled','Hold')
AND
`tabProject`.department='REC'

GROUP BY
`tabTask`.`project`
HAVING SUM(`tabTask`.`r1_count`) > 0
ORDER BY
`tabProject`.customer,`tabProject`.name
